publisher.value: HL7 International - Biomedical Research and Regulation Work Group

description.value: The PCORNet Lab Loinc Source Codes contains the concepts to be used by PCORNet data marts to indicate the source of the LOINC code of the Lab test that produced the lab result.

definition.value: Assigned by the instrument used to process the sample and generate the result.
Code is assigned by the system used to manage laboratory results, either stand-alone or as part of the EHR.
Code is assigned from an external HL7 feed or other interface (e.g., by a Health Information Exchange).
LOINC codes are generated during the extract-transform-load (ETL) procedures used to populate a standalone data warehouse or reporting database.
LOINC codes are assigned as part of the ETL process used to populate the PCORnet CDM.
Codes are assigned through the ETL used to populate a CDM that is upstream from the PCORnet ETL.
Source/provenance of the LOINC code for this result has No information.
Source/provenance of the LOINC code for this result is Unknown.
Source/provenance of the LOINC code for this result is Other.
